## XOwlPost-TicTacToe

Welcome to **XOwlPost-TicTacToe**, a decentralized gaming platform built on Ethereum blockchain. Our platform allows users to play TicTacToe against each other and place bets on the outcome of the game.

### Features

- Betting system with fixed and progressive fee structure
- NFT badge system
- Video calling feature for bets above 2 ether

### How to Play

1. Connect your wallet to the platform.
2. Choose a game and place your bet.
3. Wait for an opponent to join the game.
4. Play the game of TicTacToe and see if you win!

### Issue Reporting

If you encounter any issues while using our platform, please submit a bug report using our [template](./ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md).

### Contributing

We welcome contributions from anyone who wants to help improve our platform. If you're interested in contributing, please see our [contributing guidelines](./CONTRIBUTING.md).

Join the XOwlPost-TicTacToe community today and see if you have what it takes to be the ultimate TicTacToe champion!
